newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks seen slipping on profit taking.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks seen slipping on profit taking.

text.p: DHAKA, April 16 (Reuter) Bangladesh shares may fall slightly on Wednesday with small investors booking profit ahead of the three-day Moslem Eid al-Adha festival, brokers said.

"The small investors may try to cash their scrips in for funds because of the festival. But institutional investors may extend support to the market to prevent it from falling" too far, said broker Mohammad Ullah.
The Dhaka Stock Exchange all-share price index rose 21.57 points, or 1.98 percent, to 1,110.66 on turnover of 35.7 million taka on Tuesday.
